Anjali & Praveen

Save the date

August 31, 2014

Our Story

I walked in my office for the first time, and there he was, a simple, sober person sitting close to my desk. We met for the first time, unaware that we would want to spend all our lives together in future. I found him as a very quiet and decent person who would work sincerely. Once we started talking about work, about personal lives, we figured out that we shared common opinion about several things. It was not long before he realised about his feelings towards me and thought about sharing with me. That was a turning point in my life, and I felt I could not have found a better person to spend my life with and no one other than him could make me feel happier. And now, here we are, ready to tie the knot to get to the next level. Yes, we are getting married! We would be glad to have you as a part of the ceremony and share our happiness.

Venue and Date will be updated soon

Getting to Bangalore

Flying: Try looking for flights into MakeMyTrip. Cabs or car services are available throughout the day and would cost around INR 600-1000.

Driving: Whether you’re flying in and renting or driving from elsewhere, having a car is good if you want to explore the area. If you are happy hanging at the venue, then don’t worry about a car.  

Thank You!

We look forward to seeing all of our friends and family soon. Thank you for all your love and support! Please let us know if you have any questions about the wedding weekend.
